1: Push B1 and B2 towards SA3
10: Rotate right until you are nudging B1 slightly
2: Rotate 90 degrees right while holding B2 to face towars SA3
3: Reverse back until level with SA2
4: Turn 90 degrees left and drive down to push B1 down slightly
7: Move forward, pushing B1, B2 and B5 towards SA2
8: Push B2 forward so that it's touching the bottom left corner of SA1
9: Turn 110 degrees left and move B3 into SA1
